snippet: A county sheriff was fatally shot in rural West Virginia on Wednesday, and a fleeing suspect was arrested after being shot by a deputy.
abstract: West Virginia Sheriff Eugene Crum is fatally shot and fleeing suspect Tennis M Maynard is arrested after being shot by a deputy.
lead_paragraph: A county sheriff was fatally shot in rural West Virginia on Wednesday, and a fleeing suspect was arrested after being shot by a deputy.

headline.main: West Virginia: Man Held in Sheriff’s Killing
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Man Held In Sheriff’s Killing
